content.p: Associate Professor, Dr. Lau Phei Li is an Assistant Professor at the Department of Chemical and Environmental Engineering. She obtained her BEng (Hons) (Chemical Process Engineering with Biotechnology, First Class) and PhD degrees from the University of Sheffield, UK. Her research interests include: green chemical technologies for the synthesis of high value-added materials, microreactor technologies, and recycling of carbon fibre into thermal fabrics for industrial and aerospace applications. CHEE2023 Analytical Measurement CHEE3024 Biochemical Engineering CHEE3024 Air Pollution Supercritical Fluid Technology for chemical syntheses.
